item.title: Hackety Hack with Green Shoes
item.dc:creator: ashbb
item.content:encoded:
Wish to run Hackety Hack with Green Shoes. :)

Green Shoes is one of the colorful Shoes. But it is not fully compatible with Red Shoes.

So, I'm going to do both

- revising HH code for Green Shoes.
- improving GS code for Hackety Hack.

This commit is a first step. It's too small and there is a long way.
But anyway, let me start! ;-)

ashbb
